title: Incredible one of a kind T205 Eddie Collins paperweight ONE DAY SALE
author: GrayGhost

posts.post_title: Incredible one of a kind T205 Eddie Collins paperweight ONE DAY SALE
posts.post_content:
For sale TODAY ONLY for someone who wants to add a special gem. ORIGINAL t 205 Eddie Collins entombed in a vintage paperweight. What a great piece for a collector to have on their desk or anyplace actually.

250 insured shipped. Today only. Paypal only. first to PM can get this. thanks. Scott. 

Don't miss out on your one day chance at history Scott. if this does not sell by midnight will be pulled. Trade/cash offers need 200 cash plus some good trade.
